item.title: How to manage projexts, the *NIX way!
item.description: @media only screen and (max-width : 768px) { .imageimageframe { width: 90% !important; } } Rofi menu: Listing all active projects Finished skills smething goes here @media only screen and (max-width : 768px) { .textframefill { width: 90% !important; } } Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content.
